description.value:
Archetype @Compendium[ponyfinder-foundryvtt-module.ponyfinder-archetypes.Artifact Tender]{Artifact Tender}

When using a wand, staff, or scroll to Cast a Spell, you may perform an additional somatic component to enhance the effect, causing the spell to behave as if it were heightened by one level.

value.value: expert in Occultism, Arcana, Nature, or Religion
